title: Update tk next to exclude awaiting tasks
description:
Modify the NextTask method in internal/ticks/client.go to exclude tasks where awaiting is set:

Current behavior:
- Returns next open, unblocked, non-manual task

New behavior:
- Returns next open, unblocked task where awaiting=null

This may require:
1. Parsing JSON output from tk next --json
2. Filtering locally if tk CLI doesn't support the filter yet
3. Or updating the tk next command itself

Note: Manual field check should be backwards-compatible (check both manual and awaiting).

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] tk next skips tasks with awaiting set
- [ ] tk next skips tasks with manual=true (backwards compat)
- [ ] Agent only receives tasks ready for agent work
- [ ] Tests verify filtering behavior
